name: Blast Bang Boom
description:
Blast Bang Boom (BBB) is a 2D shooting game in which the player has to destroy targets with projectiles. But there is more! Depending on what difficulty the player chooses to play on their will be colour coordinated targets and projectiles so only the correct colour will destroy the target. The speed of the game will also increase or decrease depending on the difficulty of the game choosen.

This is my 1st independent game made by myself
